students.bio: Life's a garden. Dig it! - Joe Dirt

students.name: Rachel Morgan
students.bio: Hardworking individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment, enjoys speaking fluent sarcasm and has a small obsession with TMNT.

students.name: Seth Dorris
students.bio: Former Active Duty Army Captain turned Software Developer. I love C#/.NET, my two french bulldogs (Pig and Bentley), football and working out.

students.name: Ryan Tanay
students.bio: With a background in digital art computer hardware and networking I'd dabbled in code before NSS. Nothing beats the satisfaction of learning a new technique or technology and using it to solve the problem at hand.

students.name: Tom Griffey
students.bio: Rock 'n roll in human form. Music tech enthusiast and musician who eats new technologies for breakfast. Also passionate about education, civic hacking and youth development through the arts.
